content.raw:
I think you don't need to downgrade gazebo.

The packages are currently located at http://old.gazebosim.org/assets/distributions but we are in the [process of migrating to a new storage location](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-request/53/initial-work-on-s3_upload/diff). You should be able to remove your current version of drcsim, download the deb that you want, and use `sudo dpkg -i drcsim_X.deb` to install it.
content.html:
I think you don't need to downgrade gazebo.

The packages are currently located at http://old.gazebosim.org/assets/distributions but we are in the process of migrating to a new storage location. You should be able to remove your current version of drcsim, download the deb that you want, and use sudo dpkg -i drcsim_X.deb to install it.
